reviewText: My Wife liked this and uses it. I think the other reviewer is looking for lots of nudity, wrong site for that! If you want to get a refresher on your mojo, then this isn't a bad place to start. Angel who is in the Broadway show Rock of Ages does a great job.

There's no nudity.  The whole movie looks like it was shot by a Sony Handycam(R).... Terrible instruction by a not so attractive lady.  She's wearing a fullbody leotard under her outfits the whole time.

The actual DVD was not impressive to me,there was not enough variety in the program, in other words repetitive. A little boring. There would not have been any way of knowing this, unless the DVD had been previewed,which it was not. However the company who sent it, were excellent, since upon telling them I was not impressed with this DVD, they immediately offered to return my money.

The DVD had been viewed and as yet I have not known many companies who would have offered to do this.

Get Sexy Fit - In 10 Minutes, It's great, you get the tips and tricks to help you be sexier when you really need to - with your special someone. If you don't make the effort you can guarantee someone else will. And hey ladies, don't we feel great when we are in control and have real power with our sexuality? I would guarantee this to be a relationship saver if used right.

What was in the dvd does not match what is on the dvd cover. But Angel reed was creative none the less. Would prefer that the cover reflects what is in the dvd instead of being used as an attempt to use sexuality to sell a good exercise dvd.
I can already do better than this lol. You would do just as well having any ten year old girl teaching you to dance!
there was nothing exotic about the movie the only thing exotic about this was the title, should be free not worth the money.

I wanted something that wasn't pornographic that I coud use to help choreograph a playful striptease for my husband. This gave some really basic steps but nothing I couldn't have figured out on my own. I think any woman with enough confidence to strip for anyone can probably (instinctively) figure out the strut and pivot. What I had hoped for were tips for segueing from standing to floor work (which she covers but not with any secrets to make it look better) or actually removing clothes without looking awkward.
What I did get from it was a basic one minute routine that I can add to.
If you're buying this for the "Fit" aspect, don't. Nothing on here will feel like a work out. The hardest part is, seriously, just going from all fours and then leaning back, then getting up.
for some reason i haven't been able to get this dvd to play through my player or game systems or computer  going to have to buy a new dvd player and see if i can get it to work
Hahaha worst video ever. She is so awkward!!! Nothing can be learned from this at all. Only how to watch this lady give the worst examples ever. Pretty smile though.

This DVD  is fun to do! Easy to do.. and totally worth it, now don't expect it to be a weight loss dvd ... it's more of a fun sexy dance dvd.. it's not high impact but there were some things I wasn't able to do because let's face it some of us aren't built to move like that lol.  But seriousely it is fun to do and sometimes you'll giggle at yourself.  You could even gather a few of your friends together and have a "girls only" party and all get together and learn to strip and strut for your significant others. I recommend this item I think it's great and worth it! and if you need to exercise and don't really like to..... heres a good excuse to get up and get moving ;)
This is such a waste of money. Don't think you will try it because it is on sale and cheap. I am throwing mine in the trash.

If you're tired of countless hours at the gym with less than impressive results, then I would encourage you to try out Angel Reed's 10 minute Get Sexy Fit workout dvd! It's fun, fresh, and gives you a good full-body workout. The directions are easy to follow and Angel's ability to making you feel a little sexier than usual is a definite bonus.
